reproduction.crash_signature: state type must have a known bit width; got '!llhd.ref<i1>'
reproduction.notes: The current version of arcilator (LLVM-22 based) does NOT trigger the bug. The original command failed with 'state type must have a known bit width; got '!llhd.ref<i1>'', but with current tools it runs successfully and produces LLVM IR output.
